name: Savii (Uploan)
description:
At SAVii Philippines, a salary is more than just take-home pay – it’s the safest vehicle to financial empowerment. We support over 500,000 employees with safe, convenient and affordable loans, advances, mental health support, financial education and COVID insurance, with no risk or obligation for employers.
 Our 100+ corporate employer partners get data insight that can help manage attrition and unlock engaged, productive employees.
features: Dedicated support in partnership with your employer
Headline: Financial well-being linked to your salary
ShortDescription: At Savii Philippines, a salary is more than just take-home pay – it’s the safest vehicle to financial empowerment.
enhanced_description: Savii (Uploan) is a Philippines-based HR technology solution focused on employee financial empowerment and holistic well-being, directly linked to salary. The platform offers employees safe, convenient, and affordable financial services, including loans and advances, complemented by mental health support, financial education, and COVID insurance. For its 100+ corporate employer partners, Savii provides valuable data insights that assist in managing attrition and fostering a more engaged and productive workforce, all without posing any financial risk or obligation to the employer.
key_use_cases: Providing safe and affordable employee loans and advances
Offering mental health support to employees
Delivering financial education programs to employees
Providing COVID insurance as an employee benefit
Gaining data insights for attrition management and workforce planning
Improving employee happiness and engagement through financial and well-being support
competitive_advantages: Hassle-free setup for employers with fewer requirements
Dedicated support in partnership with the employer
Accessible online platform allowing employees to apply anytime
Eliminates financial risk or obligation for corporate employer partners
Provides actionable data insights to employers to help manage attrition
Comprehensive offering including financial services, mental health, financial education, and insurance
roi_benefits: Reduced employee attrition by addressing financial stress and enhancing well-being
Mitigation of financial risk and obligation for employers related to employee support
Improved employee happiness and morale within the workforce
primary_users: HR Professionals (for program management and insights)
Employers (as partners and beneficiaries of engagement data)
